reviewText: Bought this for younger male relative who is just starting to get interested in grilling. Provides a good start for someone learning the ropes

Bobby Flay is a guru of flavor, and the grill is is favorite kitchen. This book captures Flay's unique approach to creating sophisticated tastes. Yes, he uses a lot of ingredients -- his recipes are best suited for a cook/griller who's not afraid of taking time in the cause of excellence. But who can argue with the result? A highly recommended gift, too.
Our Son loves cooking shows and has collected several DVD's of different cooking shows with different people. We will keep getting them for him.
Useful and fun show, I recommend it to all Grilling Fans > .. I got all other DVD's ... its really good
This is Bobby Flay's best TV series.  Here, he really teaches techniques and winning flavor combinations.  Wish there were more episodes on DVD available.
